txt.en: The Easterlings have employed a number of workers to construct deadly siege-weapons, a task which they perform with fierce pleasure and pride, for they loathe the Rohirrim.

The Easterlings who build the weapons of war are as deadly as those who wield the weapons. You have defeated many of these builders, preventing more siege-craft from being assembled for the assault on the Rohirrim.
The Easterlings have employed a number of workers to construct deadly siege-weapons, a task which they perform with fierce pleasure and pride, for they loathe the Rohirrim.
Defeat Easterling workers in the Woodyard ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The Woodyard is on the eastern side of JÃ³shkhin Orda in the Wold, to the north of North-torr.\n\nYou should defeat Easterling workers in the Woodyard to cease the construction of deadly siege-weapons.

The Easterlings who build the weapons of war are as deadly as those who wield the weapons. You have defeated many of these builders, preventing more siege-craft from being assembled for the assault on the Rohirrim.
